    if snake_direction == "LEFT":
        snake_x -= GRID_SIZE
    if snake_direction == "RIGHT":
        snake_x += GRID_SIZE

    # Check for collision with food
    if snake_x == food_x and snake_y == food_y:

        food_x = random.randrange(0, SCREEN_WIDTH // GRID_SIZE) * GRID_SIZE

        snake_body.insert(0, (snake_x, snake_y))  # Grow the snake
    else:
        snake_body.insert(0, (snake_x, snake_y))
        snake_body.pop()  # Remove the tail

    # Check for collision with walls
    if (
        snake_x < 0
        or snake_x >= SCREEN_WIDTH
        or snake_y < 0
        or snake_y >= SCREEN_HEIGHT
    ):
        game_over()

    # Check for collision with itself
    if (snake_x, snake_y) in snake_body[1:]:  # Exclude the head
        game_over()

    # Clear the screen
    screen.fill(BACKGROUND_COLOR)

    # Draw the snake and food
    draw_snake(snake_body)
    draw_food(food_x, food_y)

    # Display the score
    score_text = font.render(f"Score: {score}", True, TEXT_COLOR)
    screen.blit(score_text, (5, 5)) #Position of score

    # Update the display
    pygame.display.update()

    # Control the frame rate
    clock.tick(SNAKE_SPEED)
